ComicInfo.Summary:
The year is 2022. The remnants of civilization survive underwater after a cataclysmic event decimates the earth. Warfare destroys the remaining dry land, and survivors are forced to eke out an existence beneath the sea, relying on technology to remain in the realm of the living. Azure hasn't come into contact with another human for seven years and believes herself to be alone — until a blip materializes on her radar.
Azure suits up, emerges from her ship, and heads out into the submerged ruins of a city to find just another mutated sea creature. She observes, catalogs, and destroys it. Just another day in the life. But her memories of her past — her life, her work, and the last days of human civilization — are uncertain. They blur together with other memories of her time in a medical facility and the vessel that she now calls home.
